title: The Week Ling Baker Became a Superhero
summary: Ling Baker, a 30-year-old advisor and teacher, discovers her superpowers over the course of a week and decides to use them to educate and protect her community.
summaryGerman: Ling Baker, eine 30-jährige Beraterin und Lehrerin, entdeckt im Laufe einer Woche ihre Superkräfte und beschließt, sie zu nutzen, um ihre Gemeinde zu bilden und zu schützen.
summaryDutch: Ling Baker, een 30-jarige adviseur en leraar, ontdekt haar superkrachten gedurende een week en besluit ze te gebruiken om haar gemeenschap te onderwijzen en te beschermen.
summaryFrench: Ling Baker, une conseillère et enseignante de 30 ans, découvre ses super-pouvoirs au cours d'une semaine et décide de les utiliser pour éduquer et protéger sa communauté.

story.text: Ling Baker starts her week with a strange tingling sensation that makes her feel inexplicably energetic. As she teaches her class on modern philosophy, she senses she can anticipate the students’ questions before they even ask them.
During a staff meeting, Ling accidentally reads her principal’s thoughts, realizing her ability to perceive others' minds. She feels a mix of excitement and eeriness as she explores this new ability.
Ling uses her break to experiment with her powers. She finds she can extend her energy to calm heated arguments in the cafeteria, bringing a peaceful resolution.
Ling’s powers grow, and she feels triumphant when she successfully mediates a difficult parent-teacher conference by subtly influencing emotions and thoughts to foster understanding.

With her new abilities, Ling feels a deep responsibility. She spends her day helping troubled students, using her insight to guide them towards better futures, which fills her with a sense of purpose and happiness.
Taking a day off, Ling meets with old friends who notice her newfound serenity and wisdom. Discussions turn deep and philosophical, sparking romantic feelings in an unexpected connection.
Ling decides to embrace her role as a superhero in her community, committing to use her powers to advise, teach, and protect. She feels epic as she plans out her future steps.

ending: And so, Ling Baker, once a simple teacher, stood poised to become a beacon of knowledge and protection, her life forever changed by the events of an unforgettable week.
moral: Great power truly comes with great responsibility, and the best way to use it is for the betterment of others.
